00026   bool satisfied(const Cell& cell, 
00027                  unsigned int , 
00028                  unsigned int toPart) const
00029   {
00030     const int weight = cell.getWeight();
00031     const int diffTo = _diff[toPart] + weight;
00032     const int diffFrom = _diff[fromPart] - weight;
00033     return diffFrom >= _lowerBound && diffTo <= _upperBound ;
00034   }
00035 };
